job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Careers That Change LivesbrbrIn this exciting role as Software Engineer I you will have responsibility for the analysis specification design and development of software for medical applications in a regulated environment using standard software engineering tools and methods This position involves the design implementation automated testing and documentation to support software and tools of the navigation robotics and ablation systems This position requires the understanding and following of regulations procedures and guidelines for software as a medical device A successful candidate is selfmotivated and is able to work in a team environment The successful candidate is a continuous learner and strives for continuous improvementbrbrThe Enabling Technologies group develops liferestoring therapies and healthcare solutions that span the care continuum integrating technologies and applying clinical and economic evidence to increase patient access improve efficiency of procedures and deliver successful patient outcomesbrbrA Day in the Lifebrulli Designing developing testing and documenting software components and applicationslili Supporting requirements gathering estimating and planning effortslili Interfacing with mechanical electrical systems and test engineerslili Troubleshooting debugging maintaining and supporting existing software productslili Supporting labs and surgical evaluations of productslili Representing the company at industry trade shows and customer siteslili Participating in and leading ongoing professional development activitieslili Following Medtronic Navigation product development standards and practiceslili Identifying and implementing process improvementslili Willingness and ability to assume increased responsibilitylili Occasional domestic and international travel may be requiredlili All activities must be performed in compliance with the Quality Systemlili Performs duties in compliance with environmental health and safety related site rules policies or governmental regulationsbrliulMust Havebrulli Bachelors Degree required with 0 years of experiencebrliulNice to Havebrulli Degree in Computer Science or similar Engineering discipline Practical experience programming in Clili Knowledge of software design development debug and test practiceslili Ability to work in a team environmentlili Experience in software design including OOAOOD and design patternslili Experience with other languages Python bash Go Javalili Experience with development on GNULinux platformlili Experience with knowledge of modern iterative software design processes and development practices Scrum Scaled Agile Framework Test Driven DevelopmentbrliulstronguAbout MedtronicbrbrustrongTogether we can change healthcare worldwide At Medtronic we push the limits of what technology therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain restore health and extend life We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to bebrbrWe want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations  but we will only succeed with the right people on our team Lets work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients lives Help us shape the futurebrbrPhysical Job RequirementsbrbrThe physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions For Office Roles While performing the duties of this job the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile The employee is also required to interact with a computer and communicate with peers and coworkers Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements
